title: ellArum vArungaL
sahitya:
ellArum vArungaL ellArum sErungaL Ishanai anbu sheivOm


anupallavi

  ellArum pADungaL ellArum ADungaL inba shikharattil anbu mayamAga


caraNam    jAti matha bhEdamillai ingE samayOga sAdhakar nAm Adi bhagavan 
onrE Aruyirk-kulam onrE Alaya ulagonrE anaivarum vAzhgavanrE
